story:
Once upon a time, in the vast desert of Iraq, there lived a young camel named Ali. Ali was known for his kind heart and adventurous spirit. Every night, Ali would wander under the twinkling stars, exploring the dunes and listening to the whispers of the wind.

One night, as Ali roamed the desert, he heard a faint cry coming from a nearby oasis. Curious, Ali hurried towards the sound and discovered a tiny desert mouse named Layla. Layla had lost her way and was feeling scared and alone.

Without hesitation, Ali offered his help to Layla. He gently picked her up and carried her on his back, promising to guide her safely back to her family. As they journeyed through the moonlit desert, Ali shared tales of his own adventures and made Layla laugh with his playful antics.

By the time they reached Layla's family, the sun was starting to rise, painting the sky in hues of pink and gold. Layla's family was overjoyed to see her safe and sound, thanks to Ali's kindness and bravery. They invited Ali to stay and rest before making his way back home.

As Ali settled down to rest, Layla snuggled close to him, grateful for his friendship. The stars above twinkled brighter, blessing the unlikely friendship between a camel and a mouse in the magical desert of Iraq.

And from that night on, Ali and Layla were inseparable companions, exploring the desert together and spreading joy wherever they went. And so, dear child, remember that kindness and courage can light up the darkest nights and lead you to unexpected and wonderful adventures.

The End. Goodnight, sweet child, sleep peacefully under the watchful eyes of the desert stars.
